mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_order ( id, enterprise_id, parent_id, type, rc_id, rc_contact_id, no, project_id, goods_id, create_id, create_time, modify_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{enterpriseId}, #{parentId}, #{type}, #{rcId}, #{rcContactId}, #{no}, #{projectId}, #{goodsId}, #{createId}, now(), now() )

INSERT INTO t_order ( id, enterprise_id, parent_id, type, rc_id, rc_contact_id, no, project_id, goods_id, create_id, create_time, modify_time ) VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.enterpriseId}, #{item.parentId}, #{item.type}, #{item.rcId}, #{item.rcContactId}, #{item.no}, #{item.projectId}, #{item.goodsId}, #{item.createId}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT o.*, rc.name AS rc_name, rcc.name AS rc_contact_name, p.name AS project_name, g.no AS goods_no, g.spec_x AS goods_spec_x, g.spec_y AS goods_spec_y, g.photos AS goods_photos, g.name AS goods_name, g.unit AS goods_unit, gt.name AS type_name, u.name AS create_name FROM t_order o LEFT JOIN t_related_company rc ON o.rc_id = rc.id LEFT JOIN t_related_company_contact rcc ON o.rc_contact_id = rcc.id LEFT JOIN t_project p ON o.project_id = p.id LEFT JOIN t_goods g ON o.goods_id = g.id LEFT JOIN t_goods_type gt ON g.type_id = gt.id LEFT JOIN t_user u ON o.create_id = u.id WHERE o.id = #{id}
